entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

RAIN AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 40
